remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於 WMI 路徑可以是相對或完整，可能會發生範圍與指定的路徑之間的衝突。Because WMI paths can be relative or full, a conflict between the scope and the path specified may arise. 不過，如果已指定的範圍，並指定相對的 WMI 路徑，然後沒有衝突。However, if a scope is specified and a relative WMI path is specified, then there is no conflict. 以下是一些可能發生的衝突：The following are some possible conflicts: 如果未指定的範圍，並指定相對的 WMI 路徑，然後領域會預設為本機電腦的。If a scope is not specified and a relative WMI path is specified, then the scope will default to the local machine's . 如果未指定的範圍，會指定完整的 WMI 路徑範圍會推斷從範圍部分的完整路徑。If a scope is not specified and a full WMI path is specified, then the scope will be inferred from the scope portion of the full path. 例如，完整的 WMI 路徑：`\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'`將代表 WMI 物件 'MyClass.Name='abc'"範圍內 '\\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace'。For example, the full WMI path: `\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'` will represent the WMI object 'MyClass.Name='abc'" in the scope '\\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace'. 如果已指定的範圍，會指定完整的 WMI 路徑範圍將會覆寫的完整路徑的領域部分。If a scope is specified and a full WMI path is specified, then the scope will override the scope portion of the full path. 例如，如果已指定下列範圍：\\指定 \MyMachine\root\MyScope，以及下列的完整路徑： \\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc'，然後尋找下列`object: \\MyMachine\root\MyScope:MyClass.Name= 'abc'`（範圍組件的完整路徑會被忽略）。For example, if the following scope was specified: \\\MyMachine\root\MyScope, and the following full path was specified: \\\MyMachine\root\MyNamespace:MyClass.Name='abc', then look for the following `object: \\MyMachine\root\MyScope:MyClass.Name= 'abc'` (the scope part of the full path is ignored). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 管理物件已繫結至特定的命名空間會釋放原始的 WMI 物件中的 WMI 物件之後，請變更的屬性。Changing the property after the management object has been bound to a WMI object in a particular namespace results in releasing the original WMI object. 這會導致重新繫結至新的物件範圍的值與新的路徑屬性所指定的管理物件。This causes the management object to be rebound to the new object specified by the new path properties and scope values. 重新繫結只會對在 「 延遲 」 的方式，也就是要求的值需要繫結至 WMI 物件的管理物件。The rebinding is performed in a "lazy" manner, that is, only when a requested value requires the management object to be bound to the WMI object. 變更可能對以外的更多的屬性，然後再嘗試重新繫結 （例如，同時修改範圍和路徑屬性）。Changes can be made to more than just the property before attempting to rebind (for example, modifying the scope and path properties simultaneously). ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化的新執行個體類別預設的命名空間，然後再變更的 WMI 路徑。The following example initializes a new instance of the class with the default namespace, and then changes the WMI path of the .
